invitationMessage: Please grace us with your presence and blessings as we celebrate.
invitationDetail: Join us in blessing our little one.
venue: Venue: Our Residence (Nirmalya), Belepada, Bengal, Hooghly.

poem.title: Come, O Tea
lines: In the boat filled with nails,
The boatman took the boat away,

thankYouMessage: Thank you for being with us!
gratitudeMessage: We are grateful for your presence at the annaprashan ceremony of our dear grandson, Devamalya Mukhopadhyay. Your blessings and good wishes mean a lot to us. We look forward to sharing many more joyful occasions with you. Thank you for being a part of this special day.
